Package sample.mvc

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
sample.mvc.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Controller is responsible for linking View layer and Model layer. The Controller receives the request from the View and calls the method in the Model.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller​(Model model, SubModel subModel)
      This is the only constructor of the Controller class. It initializes the model and subModel objects.
      Parameters:
      model - Model object
      subModel - SubModel object

  • Method Details

    • SaveGame

      public void SaveGame()
      This is the method used to call the SaveGame function in the Model. It receives the request from the View to save the game and calls the corresponding method in the Model to save the game.

    • LoadGame

      public void LoadGame()
      This is the method used to call the LoadGame function in the Model. It receives the request from the View to load the game and calls the corresponding method in the Model to load the game.

    • CloseGame

      public void CloseGame()
      This is the method used to call the CloseGame function in the SubModel. It receives the request from the View to close the game and calls the corresponding method in the SubModel to close the game.

    • Undo

      public void Undo()
      This is the method used to call the Undo function in the SubModel. It receives the request from the View to undo the step and calls the corresponding method in the SubModel to undo the step.

    • ToggleMusic

      public void ToggleMusic()
      This is the method used to call the ToggleMusic function in the SubModel. It receives the request from the View to play music and calls the corresponding method in the SubModel to play music.

    • ToggleDebug

      public void ToggleDebug()
      This is the method used to call the ToggleDebug function in the SubModel. It receives the request from the View to debug and calls the corresponding method in the SubModel to debug.

    • SetWallColour

      public void SetWallColour​(int index)
      This is the method used to call the SetWallColour function in the SubModel. It receives the request from the View to set the wall colour and calls the corresponding method in the SubModel to set the wall colour.
      Parameters:
      index - int received from the View, each index represents a color.

    • ResetLevel

      public void ResetLevel()
      This is the method used to call the ResetLevel function in the SubModel. It receives the request from the View to reset the level and calls the corresponding method in the SubModel to reset the level.

    • ShowAbout

      public void ShowAbout()
      This is the method used to call the ShowAbout function in the SubModel. It receives the request from the View to show about message and calls the corresponding method in the SubModel to show about message.

    • PauseGame

      public void PauseGame()
      This is the method used to call the PauseGame function in the Model. It receives the request from the View to pause the game and calls the corresponding method in the Model to pause the game.

    • Clock

      public void Clock()
      This is the method used to call the Clock function in the Model. It receives the request from the View to start the timer and calls the corresponding method in the Model to start the timer.

    • GetGameGrid

      public javafx.scene.layout.GridPane GetGameGrid()
      This is the method used to call the GetGameGrid function in the Model. It receives the request from the View to get the gameGrid and calls the corresponding method in the Model to get the same gameGrid as the Model to ensure that the game runs normally.
      Returns:
      GameGrid gameGrid

    • LoadDefaultSaveFile

      public void LoadDefaultSaveFile​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage, java.lang.String nickName)
      This is the method used to call the loadDefaultSaveFile function in the Model. It receives the request from the View to start game and calls the corresponding method in the Model to load the default game.
      Parameters:
      primaryStage - Stage passed in from Main.
      nickName - String representing the player's nickname obtained from View.
